Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 83rd overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2016...
Traded from Tampa Bay to St. Louis on 5/23/2017 (Going to TB: P N. Maronde, P J. Lathan. Going to STL: P G. Pabst)...
Injured on 5/19/2019 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 6/18/2019 with a Pulled Tricep Muscle, out for 6-7 weeks...
Released by St. Louis on 4/1/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 4/15/2021 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/11/2022 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/4/2023 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Earned first career win on 9/24/2023...
Injured on 7/23/2024 with a Broken Elbow, out for 8-9 weeks...
